short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Resurce Market for Wolf Game at https://game.wolf.game

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
In-Game Resource Market Hub for Wolf Game

This extension introduces the functionality to buy and sell in-game resources such as Water, Wood, Stone, Chops, and Grass using the Wolf Game Governance token, WOOL, in Wolf Game.

Once installed, a button will appear in the game's top bar, alongside your resources. By clicking this button, you'll access a new in-game interface where you can conveniently exchange your resources.
